Waffle Recipe

Make perfect waffles in Grow a Garden

Difficulty

Easy

Cooking Time

‚è±Ô∏è 5 minutes 30 seconds

Pot Color

üç≥ Various (depends on ingredients)

Ingredients

6 combinations

Ingredients

2x Corn, 1x Strawberry‚úì
2x Corn, 1x Blueberry‚úì
2x Corn, 1x Banana‚úì
2x Corn, 1x Apple‚úì
2x Corn, 1x Watermelon‚úì
2x Corn, 1x Mango‚úì

Instructions

1

Go to Chris P's Kitchen in the main plaza

2

Add the required ingredients to the cooking pot

3

Start making the waffles

4

Wait for the cooking time to complete

5

Collect your finished waffles

6

Give them to Chris P for rewards

Chris P Craving System

üê∑ Craving Pattern

Chris P loves waffles during breakfast hours

Best Time: Morning hours for breakfast cravings

üéØ Ingredient Strategy

Excellent with Common to Uncommon ingredients

Pot Color: Various (depends on ingredients)

Pro Tips

üí°

Waffles are perfect for beginners

üí°

üí°

Great for breakfast cravings

üí°

Quick and easy to master

üí°

Pot color varies based on ingredients used

üí°

Perfect for morning breakfast cravings
